messages.content: Huh... I'm left handed and have never realised I do this.
Wondered 'why doesn't it seem like theyre making any progress' before I realized how short the loop was....
I thought my [RELIGION] boarding school was weird but now it seems pretty tame and mild in comparison.
This reminds me of when it came out that the Hello Kitty! character is actually a human girl.
I clearly recall being told the same thing in ‘97, when I was driving a ‘74...except the years were different obv.
These style skins remind me so much of hollow knight
We live in a completely different world than the 70s and 80s now
Indeed. I thought we are just spoiled, but apparently the phenomena is not exlusive to us.
I barely recognize a picture of current day Pearl Harbor.
He doesn't realize she's banging the ukulele guy.
Of course I remember a time when I didn't know what calories were. I was a child.
I wouldn't say age would stop it just lessen the affect of it but probably start to notice it around mid to late 30's.
learn to say no more. After a few times you have something you like destroyed it gets easier.
